statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Mexican Shade Grown coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.00} per pound with some Ethiopian coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${11.30} per pound to create \displaystyle{70} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.95} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
pounds of Mexican Shade Grown coffee.
